response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, it's valued at $10,000 to me. Considering its worth to you is $8,000, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This exclusive offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best value while allowing us to share in the mutual benefits of this partnership. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 9500}
